abstract: In the Nixon administration, Mr. Brinegar helped create Conrail and institute a national 55-mile-an-hour speed limit after the first Arab oil embargo.
snippet: In the Nixon administration, Mr. Brinegar helped create Conrail and institute a national 55-mile-an-hour speed limit after the first Arab oil embargo.
lead_paragraph: Claude S. Brinegar, a transportation secretary in the Nixon and Ford administrations, who helped finance mass transit, restructure railroads in the Northeast and institute a national 55-mile-an-hour speed limit, died Friday in Palo Alto, Calif. He was 82.

headline.main: Claude S. Brinegar Is Dead at 82; Supported Mass Transit and Conrail
headline.print_headline: Claude S. Brinegar Is Dead at 82; Supported Mass Transit and Conrail
